node.html: I'm a student of Delhi Technological University, Delhi studying Computer Science and Engineering. I am a Full Stack Developer. My skills include HTML, CSS, Javascript, React, Angular, Node, MongoDB, GraphQL, MySQL.

I'm Saurabh, a student studying Computer Science Engineering who enjoys building new stuff. I'm a full stack developer and can build web apps that are useful.

I'm currently studying in Delhi Technological University, I have built a few open source projects that I thought were cool. I like to explore new technologies which I find interesting.

Here's a few things I'm experienced with:

• Worked on a FRNZY, a social + shopping platform for product and content discovery.
  • Developed and Designed the customer frontend, the seller dashboard and the admin panel using React with Apollo
  • Worked with GraphQL, Apollo and MongoDB for the backend API
  • Technologies Used - ReactJS, NodeJS, GraphQL, Apollo for Graph API

A web app for visualizing personalized Spotify data. View your top artists, top tracks, recently played tracks, and detailed audio information about each track. Create and save new playlists of recommended tracks based on your existing playlists and more.

Pinterest, but just the pictures.

My main motivation for building this was so I could cycle through pins on my boards with the left and right arrow keys and hide the other distracting features that I don't usually use on Pinterest.
A minimal, dark blue theme for VS Code, Sublime Text, Atom, iTerm, and more. Available on Visual Studio Marketplace, Package Control, Atom Package Manager, and npm.
A basic social networking Web Application made using Angular with basic user registration, sending friend requests and adding posts.
A web scraper built using Puppeteer (library by Google Chrome) to scrape information of various events (from Facebook) organised by various societies and clubs.
A simple Stone Paper Scissors game where you pass the generated link to the other player you wish to play with built using Web Sockets.
A simple Chrome Extension that can be used to find the meaning of words highlighted or selected on the page build using the Pearson API.
A Progressive Web App made using Angular 6 to manage your daily To-Do items.
A python automation script to like the posts on a Facebook page.
